name: Ghosts GO
description:
Want to catch a ghost while exploring your neighborhood? Try Ghost Catcher, a free augmented reality (AR) game where you can catch ghosts with a vacuum after disabling them with a gun as you change locations in real time.

Features:
*Collect over 20 unique ghosts, including ghost bosses. Collect Ghosts near places of interest in real life.
*Go on Missions after you've collected ghosts to gain experience and become a higher-level Ghost Hunter.
*Invite your friends on Facebook to join your crew. You will need crew members to fight boss ghosts. Once you have crew members you'll be able to see how you're doing in the game compared to your friends.
*Leaderboard for how many ghosts you've collected.
*Achievements
*Other features available and more planned.

Follow Ghost Catcher on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ghostcatcherapp

Like Ghost Catcher on Facebook:
https://facebook.com/ghostcatchergame

Visit the Ghost Catcher Forums:
https://forums.greenrobot.com/c/ghosts

For help or feedback, please email info+ghostcatcherios@greenrobot.com.
